PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_Superelevation
PropertySetDef.Definition: Specifices the general properties for a Superelevation event.

PropertyDef.Name: Superelevation
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies the superelevation as a ratio measure (slope) at the location of the event.

PropertyDef.Name: Side
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies if the superelevation is measured to the RIGHT or to the LEFT of the curve referenced by the placement, or if the same value is applied to BOTH sides.

PropertyDef.Name: Transition
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of transition of superelevation from previous event to this one.
